VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?

VEC.Q: How many segments are in the outermost ring of this sunburst chart?

SRP.Q: Is Performance Management positioned outside, inside or on the same side as Workplace Wellbeing?
SRP.A: Performance Management is positioned {outside} Workplace Wellbeing.

VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Workplace Wellbeing}.

NF.Q: Which categories in the segment Workplace Wellbeing exceed 100%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Workplace Wellbeing or Health & Safety?
NC.A: The value of {Workplace Wellbeing} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Workplace Wellbeing, Health & Safety, or Employee Development?
NC.A: The value of {Workplace Wellbeing} is larger.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Workplace Wellbeing, Health & Safety, Employee Development, or Performance Management?
NC.A: The value of {Workplace Wellbeing} is the largest.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Health & Safety, Employee Development, or Employee Lifecycle?
NC.A: The value of {Employee Lifecycle} is smaller.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Employee Development to Performance Management to Feedback to 360 Review}.
